verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Chezeini kayamba pigeni, leo furaha tele. X2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1. Leo siku ya shangwe na furaha kwa watu wote hapa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 2. Mola naye ametushushia baraka zake nyingi.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 3. Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.
